channel.title: Digital Security on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Security on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: McCaul’s Crypto Commission: First, Do No Harm
item.description: Authors: White, Nathan Published: February 2016 URL: https://www.accessnow.org/mccauls-crypto-commission-first-no-harm/ Abstract: On March 2, 2016, AccessNow published an article about the proposed McCaul-Warner Encryption Commission, which would “create a bipartisan commission of experts to study the debate over encryption and provide recommendations for overcoming the current impasse.” The article notes that despite their good intentions, “the commission, as proposed, might not produce what” they expect. The proposal relies on “the assumption that people from both ‘sides’ of the debate have not already engaged with one another in good faith” when in fact they did in the 1990s and more recently.
